scripts.build:full: rm -rf public && cd ../frontend && npx vite build --mode production && mv dist ../backend/public && cd ../backend && npx tsc
scripts.build:full-win: powershell -Command "if (Test-Path public) { Remove-Item public -Recurse -Force }; cd ../frontend; npx vite build --mode production; Move-Item dist ../backend/public; cd ../backend; npx tsc"
scripts.deploy: git add . && git commit -m "deploy a heroku" && git push heroku master
